thread.section_title: Hotel de la Paix Tour Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect stay with young adults
thread.title_full: Perfect stay with young adults - Review of Hotel de la Paix Tour Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: barbara a
title: Perfect stay with young adults
text:
The hotel is small in room size which is typical Paris style. The rooms are clean with bathroom newer styled modern. Flat screen TV and WIFI in the room. Breakfast downstairs has fresh food a bit better than continental style. if you can get it included best, as not really 15.5 euros worth. the staff is helpful, and always at their post. 24 hour maintained so if you have young adults it is okay to come and go at night. Tour Eiffel blocks away, 2 metro stations, and great restaurants right there, Rue cler too. Only negative was if people shower in middle of night, you can hear all depending where your room is located.
Room Tip: choose a room facing the street or opposing other side of hotel. See more room tips
